mdRecord.dcterms:title: Personal Correspondence from Andrew to Calohill
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Personal correspondence, from Andrew to Calohill, undated but likely very early due to subject matter of possible teaching placements, 1 original piece, 2 pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
